text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.07.Rotavirus"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.07.Rotavirus

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.07.Rotavirus

title: IMMZ.DT.07.Rotavirus

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:01:17+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Rotavirus vaccine according to the defined schedule

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT07

action

title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - No Doses

description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotavirus vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2-3 scheme depends on product)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Rotavirus immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Rotavirus 1st dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Weeks" >= 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Rotavirus 1st dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" <= 24text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Rotavirus 1st dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Patient has no history of intussusception" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Rotavirus 1st dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.07.Rotavirus.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - 1 Rotavirus dose previously given 2 dose scheme

description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotavirus vaccine immunization schedule" – minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Rotavirus immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 2nd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Rotavirus dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 2nd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" <= 24text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 2nd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Patient has no history of intussusception" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 2nd dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.07.Rotavirus.02

action

title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - 2 Rotavirus dose previously given 3 dose scheme

description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotavirus vaccine immunization schedule" – minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose assuming 3 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Rotavirus immunization history" = "2 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 3rd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Rotavirus dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 3rd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"All previous doses given with a 3 dose series product" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 3rd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Patient has no history of intussusception" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 3rd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" <= 24text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rotavirus 3rd dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.07.Rotavirus.03

title: IMMZ.DT.07.Rotavirus
